sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { DashboardService } from "../dashboard.service"; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'top-bar', templateUrl: './top-bar.component.html', }) export class TopBarComponent { isDropdownOpen: { [key: string]: boolean } = {}; sidebarOpen: boolean = true; // Initially open constructor(private dashboard: DashboardService, private router: Router) {} openSidebar() { this.dashboard.openSidebar(); } toggleDropdown() { this.isDropdownOpen = !this.isDropdownOpen; } logout() { this.userbackService.logout().subscribe( response => { console.log('Logout successful', response); // Handle successful logout here, such as redirecting to login page window.location.href = '/login'; // Example: Redirect to login page after logout }, error => { console.error('Logout failed', error); // Handle logout error here } ); } }
